mapper.select: SELECT T101.OBJ_TYPE_ID AS OBJ_TYPE_ID ,T101.ATR_ID_SEQ AS ATR_ID_SEQ ,T101.ATR_ID AS ATR_ID ,CASE WHEN T101.ATR_ALIAS_NM = '' THEN T102.ATR_NM ELSE T101.ATR_ALIAS_NM END AS ATR_NM ,T101.MULTI_ATR_YN AS MULTI_ATR_YN ,T101.CNCT_ATR_YN AS CNCT_ATR_YN ,T101.ATR_ADM_TGT_YN AS ATR_ADM_TGT_YN ,T101.MAND_YN AS MAND_YN ,T101.INDC_YN AS INDC_YN ,T101.AVAIL_CHK_PGM_ID AS AVAIL_CHK_PGM_ID ,T102.ATR_RFRN_CD AS ATR_RFRN_CD ,T102.SQL_SBST AS SQL_SBST ,T102.DATA_TYPE_CD AS DATA_TYPE_CD ,T102.COL_LEN AS COL_LEN ,T102.UI_COMP_CD AS UI_COMP_CD ,CASE WHEN T102.UI_COMP_WIDTH_RADIO IS NULL THEN T101.UI_COMP_WIDTH_RADIO ELSE T102.UI_COMP_WIDTH_RADIO END AS UI_COMP_WIDTH_RADIO ,CASE WHEN T102.UI_COMP_HEIGHT_PX IS NULL THEN T101.UI_COMP_HEIGHT_PX ELSE T102.UI_COMP_HEIGHT_PX END AS UI_COMP_HEIGHT_PX FROM PEN_OBJ_TYPE_ATR_D T101 INNER JOIN PEN_ATR_M T102 ON T101.ATR_ID = T102.ATR_ID WHERE T101.OBJ_TYPE_ID = #{objTypeId} AND T101.META_TYPE_CD = 'O' ORDER BY T101.SORT_NO
${sqlSbst}

SELECT T101.OBJ_TYPE_ID , T101.OBJ_TYPE_NM , T101.OBJ_TYPE_DESC , T101.SORT_NO , T101.UP_OBJ_TYPE_ID , T101.HIER_LEV_NO , T101.LST_LEV_YN , T101.ATR_ADM_CD , T101.STLM_YN , T101.HST_YN FROM PEN_OBJ_TYPE_M T101 WHERE T101.OBJ_TYPE_ID = #{objTypeId} ORDER BY T101.SORT_NO

select.if:
/* 수정모드 rel_group */
SELECT DISTINCT 'DOWN' AS REL_DV, DOWN_REL_TYPE_NM AS REL_TYPE_NM, UP_REL_TYPE_ID, META_REL_CD FROM PEN_REL_TYPE_M T101 WHERE OBJ_TYPE_ID = #{objTypeId} AND META_REL_CD = 'UD' AND DEL_YN = 'N' AND ATR_ADM_CD = 1 UNION ALL SELECT DISTINCT 'UP' AS REL_DV, UP_REL_TYPE_NM AS REL_TYPE_NM, UP_REL_TYPE_ID, META_REL_CD FROM PEN_REL_TYPE_M T101 WHERE REL_OBJ_TYPE_ID = #{objTypeId} AND META_REL_CD = 'UD' AND DEL_YN = 'N' AND ATR_ADM_CD = 1 UNION ALL SELECT DISTINCT 'DOWN' AS REL_DV, DOWN_REL_TYPE_NM AS REL_TYPE_NM, UP_REL_TYPE_ID, META_REL_CD FROM PEN_REL_TYPE_M T101 WHERE OBJ_TYPE_ID = #{objTypeId} AND META_REL_CD = 'FT' AND DEL_YN = 'N' AND ATR_ADM_CD = 1 UNION ALL SELECT DISTINCT 'UP' AS REL_DV, UP_REL_TYPE_NM AS REL_TYPE_NM, UP_REL_TYPE_ID, META_REL_CD FROM PEN_REL_TYPE_M T101 WHERE REL_OBJ_TYPE_ID = #{objTypeId} AND META_REL_CD = 'FT' AND DEL_YN = 'N' AND ATR_ADM_CD = 1

/* 읽 기모드 rel_group */ SELECT T101.REL_TYPE_ID, T101.DOWN_REL_TYPE_NM AS REL_TYPE_NM, 'PT' AS REL_DV FROM PEN_REL_TYPE_M T101 WHERE REL_OBJ_TYPE_ID = #{objTypeId} AND META_REL_CD = 'PT' UNION ALL SELECT T101.REL_TYPE_ID, T101.DOWN_REL_TYPE_NM, 'DOWN' AS REL_DV FROM PEN_REL_TYPE_M T101 WHERE REL_TYPE_ID IN ( SELECT UP_REL_TYPE_ID FROM PEN_REL_TYPE_M T101 WHERE OBJ_TYPE_ID = #{objTypeId} AND META_REL_CD NOT IN ('PT', 'IR', 'FT') AND DEL_YN = 'N' AND ATR_ADM_CD = 1 ) UNION ALL SELECT T101.REL_TYPE_ID, T101.UP_REL_TYPE_NM, 'UP' AS REL_DV FROM PEN_REL_TYPE_M T101 WHERE REL_TYPE_ID IN ( SELECT UP_REL_TYPE_ID FROM PEN_REL_TYPE_M T101 WHERE REL_OBJ_TYPE_ID = #{objTypeId} AND META_REL_CD NOT IN ('PT', 'IR', 'FT') AND DEL_YN = 'N' AND ATR_ADM_CD = 1 ) UNION ALL SELECT DISTINCT 'IMPCT' AS REL_TYPE_NM, '영향도' AS REL_TYPE_NM, 'IMPCT' REL_DEV FROM PEN_REL_TYPE_M T101 WHERE (OBJ_TYPE_ID = #{objTypeId} OR REL_OBJ_TYPE_ID = #{objTypeId}) AND META_REL_CD = 'FT' AND DEL_YN = 'N' AND ATR_ADM_CD = 1

mapper.select:
SELECT T101.OBJ_TYPE_ID , T101.OBJ_ID , T101.OBJ_NM , T102.OBJ_TYPE_ID AS PATH_OBJ_TYPE_ID , T102.OBJ_ID AS PATH_OBJ_ID , T102.OBJ_NM AS PATH_OBJ_NM , T103.REL_TYPE_ID FROM PEN_OBJ_M T101 LEFT OUTER JOIN PEN_OBJ_M T102 ON ( T101.PATH_OBJ_TYPE_ID = T102.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND T101.PATH_OBJ_ID = T102.OBJ_ID ) INNER JOIN PEN_REL_TYPE_M T103 ON ( T101.OBJ_TYPE_ID = CASE WHEN #{relDv} = 'UP' THEN T103.OBJ_TYPE_ID ELSE T103.REL_OBJ_TYPE_ID END AND #{objTypeId} = CASE WHEN #{relDv} = 'UP' THEN T103.REL_OBJ_TYPE_ID ELSE T103.OBJ_TYPE_ID END AND #{relTypeNm} = CASE WHEN #{relDv} = 'UP' THEN T103.UP_REL_TYPE_NM ELSE T103.DOWN_REL_TYPE_NM END AND T103.META_REL_CD = #{metaRelCd} AND T103.DEL_YN = 'N' ) AND T101.DEL_YN = 'N'
AND T101.OBJ_TYPE_ID = #{searchObjTypeId}
'${notInObjId}'
AND T101.OBJ_NM LIKE '%'||#{searchValue, jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%'
AND ROWNUM <= #{limit} ORDER BY T101.OBJ_NM

select.if: SELECT T103.OBJ_TYPE_ID , T103.OBJ_ID , T103.OBJ_NM , T104.OBJ_TYPE_ID AS PATH_OBJ_TYPE_ID , T104.OBJ_ID AS PATH_OBJ_ID , T104.OBJ_NM AS PATH_OBJ_NM , T102.REL_TYPE_ID FROM PEN_OBJ_R T101 INNER JOIN PEN_REL_TYPE_M T102 ON ( T101.OBJ_TYPE_ID = T102.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND T101.REL_OBJ_TYPE_ID = T102.REL_OBJ_TYPE_ID AND T102.DOWN_REL_TYPE_NM = #{relTypeNm} AND T102.OBJ_TYPE_ID = #{objTypeId} AND T102.META_REL_CD = #{metaRelCd} AND T102.DEL_YN = 'N' ) INNER JOIN PEN_OBJ_M T103 ON ( T101.REL_OBJ_TYPE_ID = T103.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND T101.REL_OBJ_ID = T103.OBJ_ID AND T103.DEL_YN = 'N' ) LEFT OUTER JOIN PEN_OBJ_M T104 ON ( T103.PATH_OBJ_TYPE_ID = T104.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND T103.PATH_OBJ_ID = T104.OBJ_ID AND T104.DEL_YN = 'N' ) WHERE T101.OBJ_TYPE_ID = #{objTypeId} AND T101.OBJ_ID = #{objId} AND T101.DEL_YN = 'N'

SELECT T103.OBJ_TYPE_ID , T103.OBJ_ID , T103.OBJ_NM , T104.OBJ_TYPE_ID AS PATH_OBJ_TYPE_ID , T104.OBJ_ID AS PATH_OBJ_ID , T104.OBJ_NM AS PATH_OBJ_NM , T102.REL_TYPE_ID FROM PEN_OBJ_R T101 INNER JOIN PEN_REL_TYPE_M T102 ON ( T101.REL_TYPE_ID = T102.REL_TYPE_ID AND T101.OBJ_TYPE_ID = T102.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND T101.REL_OBJ_TYPE_ID = T102.REL_OBJ_TYPE_ID AND T102.UP_REL_TYPE_NM = #{relTypeNm} AND T102.REL_OBJ_TYPE_ID = #{objTypeId} AND T102.META_REL_CD = #{metaRelCd} AND T102.DEL_YN = 'N' ) INNER JOIN PEN_OBJ_M T103 ON ( T101.OBJ_TYPE_ID = T103.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND T101.OBJ_ID = T103.OBJ_ID AND T103.DEL_YN = 'N' ) LEFT OUTER JOIN PEN_OBJ_M T104 ON ( T103.PATH_OBJ_TYPE_ID = T104.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND T103.PATH_OBJ_ID = T104.OBJ_ID AND T104.DEL_YN = 'N' ) WHERE T101.REL_OBJ_TYPE_ID = #{objTypeId} AND T101.REL_OBJ_ID = #{objId} AND T101.DEL_YN = 'N'

mapper.select: SELECT SYS_GUID() AS ID , T103.OBJ_TYPE_ID , T103.OBJ_ID , T103.OBJ_NM , T104.OBJ_TYPE_ID AS PATH_OBJ_TYPE_ID , T104.OBJ_ID AS PATH_OBJ_ID , T104.OBJ_NM AS PATH_OBJ_NM , ${n_level}+1 AS LVL , '${upId}' AS UP_ID , 'false' AS IS_EXPANDED , 'false' AS IS_LEAF FROM PEN_OBJ_R T101 INNER JOIN PEN_REL_TYPE_M T102 ON ( T101.REL_OBJ_TYPE_ID = T102.REL_OBJ_TYPE_ID AND T101.REL_TYPE_ID = T102.REL_TYPE_ID AND T102.META_REL_CD = #{metaRelCd} ) INNER JOIN PEN_OBJ_M T103 ON ( T101.OBJ_TYPE_ID = T103.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND T101.OBJ_ID = T103.OBJ_ID AND T103.DEL_YN = 'N' ) LEFT OUTER JOIN PEN_OBJ_M T104 ON ( T103.PATH_OBJ_TYPE_ID = T104.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND T103.PATH_OBJ_ID = T104.OBJ_ID AND T104.DEL_YN = 'N' ) WHERE T101.REL_OBJ_TYPE_ID = #{objTypeId} AND T101.REL_OBJ_ID = #{objId} AND T101.DEL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY OBJ_NM

SELECT SYS_GUID() AS ID , T103.OBJ_TYPE_ID , T103.OBJ_ID , T103.OBJ_NM , T104.OBJ_TYPE_ID AS PATH_OBJ_TYPE_ID , T104.OBJ_ID AS PATH_OBJ_ID , T104.OBJ_NM AS PATH_OBJ_NM , ${n_level}+1 AS LVL , '${upId}' AS UP_ID , 'false' AS IS_EXPANDED , 'false' AS IS_LEAF FROM PEN_OBJ_R T101 INNER JOIN PEN_REL_TYPE_M T102 ON ( T101.OBJ_TYPE_ID = T102.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND T101.REL_TYPE_ID = T102.REL_TYPE_ID AND T102.META_REL_CD = #{metaRelCd} ) INNER JOIN PEN_OBJ_M T103 ON ( T101.REL_OBJ_TYPE_ID = T103.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND T101.REL_OBJ_ID = T103.OBJ_ID AND T103.DEL_YN = 'N' ) LEFT OUTER JOIN PEN_OBJ_M T104 ON ( T103.PATH_OBJ_TYPE_ID = T104.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND T103.PATH_OBJ_ID = T104.OBJ_ID AND T104.DEL_YN = 'N' ) WHERE T101.OBJ_TYPE_ID = #{objTypeId} AND T101.OBJ_ID = #{objId} AND T101.DEL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY OBJ_NM

select.if: SELECT T103.OBJ_TYPE_ID , T103.OBJ_ID , T103.OBJ_NM , T104.OBJ_TYPE_ID AS PATH_OBJ_TYPE_ID , T104.OBJ_ID AS PATH_OBJ_ID , T104.OBJ_NM AS PATH_OBJ_NM FROM PEN_REL_TYPE_M T101 INNER JOIN PEN_OBJ_R T102 ON ( T101.REL_OBJ_TYPE_ID = T102.REL_OBJ_TYPE_ID AND T101.OBJ_TYPE_ID = T102.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND T102.OBJ_TYPE_ID = #{objTypeId} AND T102.OBJ_ID = #{objId} ) INNER JOIN PEN_OBJ_M T103 ON ( T102.REL_OBJ_TYPE_ID = T103.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND T102.REL_OBJ_ID = T103.OBJ_ID AND T103.DEL_YN = 'N' ) LEFT OUTER JOIN PEN_OBJ_M T104 ON ( T103.PATH_OBJ_TYPE_ID = T104.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND T103.PATH_OBJ_ID = T104.OBJ_ID AND T104.DEL_YN = 'N' ) WHERE UP_REL_TYPE_ID = #{upRelTypeId} AND ATR_ADM_CD = 1 ORDER BY T103.OBJ_NM

SELECT T103.OBJ_TYPE_ID , T103.OBJ_ID , T103.OBJ_NM , T104.OBJ_TYPE_ID AS PATH_OBJ_TYPE_ID , T104.OBJ_ID AS PATH_OBJ_ID , T104.OBJ_NM AS PATH_OBJ_NM from PEN_REL_TYPE_M T101 INNER JOIN PEN_OBJ_R T102 ON ( T101.REL_OBJ_TYPE_ID = T102.REL_OBJ_TYPE_ID AND T101.OBJ_TYPE_ID = T102.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND T102.REL_OBJ_TYPE_ID = #{objTypeId} AND T102.REL_OBJ_ID = #{objId} ) INNER JOIN PEN_OBJ_M T103 ON ( T102.OBJ_TYPE_ID = T103.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND T102.OBJ_ID = T103.OBJ_ID AND T103.DEL_YN = 'N' ) LEFT OUTER JOIN PEN_OBJ_M T104 ON ( T103.PATH_OBJ_TYPE_ID = T104.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND T103.PATH_OBJ_ID = T104.OBJ_ID AND T104.DEL_YN = 'N' ) WHERE UP_REL_TYPE_ID = #{upRelTypeId} AND ATR_ADM_CD = 1 ORDER BY T103.OBJ_NM

mapper.select: WITH BAS_INFO (ID, PID, OBJ_TYPE_ID, OBJ_ID, OBJ_NM, LVL, REL_DIV) AS ( SELECT T101.OBJ_TYPE_ID||T101.OBJ_ID AS ID, NULL AS PID, T101.OBJ_TYPE_ID, T101.OBJ_ID, T101.OBJ_NM, 1 LVL, 'ROOT' REL_DEV FROM PEN_OBJ_M T101 WHERE T101.OBJ_TYPE_ID = #{objTypeId} AND T101.OBJ_ID = #{objId} AND T101.DEL_YN = 'N' ), IMPACT_INFO (ID, PID, OBJ_TYPE_ID, OBJ_ID, OBJ_NM, LVL, REL_DEV) AS ( SELECT T101.OBJ_TYPE_ID||T101.OBJ_ID AS ID, T103.ID AS PID, T101.OBJ_TYPE_ID, T101.OBJ_ID, T101.OBJ_NM, 2 LVL, 'UP' REL_DEV FROM PEN_OBJ_M T101 INNER JOIN PEN_OBJ_R T102 ON ( T101.OBJ_TYPE_ID = T102.REL_OBJ_TYPE_ID AND T101.OBJ_ID = T102.REL_OBJ_ID AND T102.REL_TYPE_ID IN ( SELECT REL_TYPE_ID FROM PEN_REL_TYPE_M WHERE OBJ_TYPE_ID = #{objTypeId} AND META_REL_CD = 'FT' ) ) INNER JOIN BAS_INFO T103 ON ( T102.OBJ_TYPE_ID = T103.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND T102.OBJ_ID = T103.OBJ_ID ) WHERE T101.DEL_YN = 'N' ), LINEAGE_INFO (ID, PID, OBJ_TYPE_ID, OBJ_ID, OBJ_NM, LVL, REL_DEV) AS ( SELECT T101.OBJ_TYPE_ID||T101.OBJ_ID AS ID, T103.ID AS PID, T101.OBJ_TYPE_ID, T101.OBJ_ID, T101.OBJ_NM, 2 LVL, 'DOWN' REL_DEV FROM PEN_OBJ_M T101 INNER JOIN PEN_OBJ_R T102 ON ( T101.OBJ_TYPE_ID = T102.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND T101.OBJ_ID = T102.OBJ_ID AND T102.REL_TYPE_ID IN ( SELECT REL_TYPE_ID FROM PEN_REL_TYPE_M WHERE REL_OBJ_TYPE_ID = #{objTypeId} AND META_REL_CD = 'FT' ) ) INNER JOIN BAS_INFO T103 ON ( T102.REL_OBJ_TYPE_ID = T103.OBJ_TYPE_ID AND T102.REL_OBJ_ID = T103.OBJ_ID ) WHERE T101.DEL_YN = 'N' ) SELECT * FROM BAS_INFO UNION ALL SELECT * FROM IMPACT_INFO UNION ALL SELECT * FROM LINEAGE_INFO
SELECT T101.* FROM PEN_OBJ_M T101 WHERE T101.OBJ_TYPE_ID = '010301L' AND T101.DEL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY LENGTH(T101.OBJ_NM) DESC, T101.OBJ_NM DESC
